title: (x) Wutangcorp.com - Zero Twos {Grant}
content:
Hello, Can someone PLEASE help me find this font?   
   
 [http://www.wutangcorp.com/clan/shared/images/design\_06.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080622142725/http:/www.wutangcorp.com/clan/shared/images/design_06.gif)   
   
Please, post links only if the font is free.   
   
Thanks in advance!

 [‹ (x) Elkhart County Fair - Stymie {Dan}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080622142725/http:/www.typophile.com/node/2229 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Project Hardcore - Marcelduchamp {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080622142725/http:/www.typophile.com/node/2217 "Go to next forum topic")
author: tikal

comments.content: that site (link) doesnt work for me

One of the better theme sites with free downloads is [DaFont](http://web.archive.org/web/20080622142725/http:/www.dafont.com/en/theme.php?cat=203&page=16). I have put the link for the page that shows all the themes they use to categorize their fonts. The SciFi theme has at least three candidates for your sample:   
Nu School Militia, Space Marine and Venus Rising. I did not look through the 22 pages of 'Various' Techno styles, but you might also want to do that if none of these is what you want.
